title: CDC probes possible safety risk for Pfizer's new COVID shot, sees no need to change vaccine practices
author: Zoey Becker
description: Throughout the whirlwind COVID-19 vaccine rollouts in the U.S., federal officials have kept a close eye on reports of adverse events. | Despite a possible safety concern for people 65 years and older who received Pfizer and BioNTech's updated COVID vaccine, the CDC says the signal is "very unlikely" to represent a true risk.
